channel.title: CVE Feed for Store Locator Plus® -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Store Locator Plus® -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-24290|2024-08-03T19:28:23.307Z -- store%20locator%20plus%C2%AE -- store%20locator%20plus%20for%20wordpress
item.description: There are several endpoints in the Store Locator Plus for WordPress plugin through 5.5.15 that could allow unauthenticated attackers the ability to inject malicious JavaScript into pages.
